record.titleName: Commission on Freedom of the Press
record.description: Members of the Commission on the Freedom of the Press; left to right: Arthur M. Schlesinger (Professor of History, Harvard); Ruth A. Inglis (Commission staff member); Robert Redfield (Dean, Division of Social Sciences, University of Chicago); William E. Hocking (Professor of Philosophy, emeritus, Harvard); Robert D. Leigh (Commission director); Llewellyn White (Commission assistant director); Robert M. Hutchins (Chancellor, University of Chicago, Commission chairman); Zechariah Chafee, Jr., (Professor of Law, Harvard, Commission vice chairman); Kurt Riezler (Professor of Philosophy, New School for Social Research); Beardsley Ruml (Chairman of the Board, R. H. Macy & Company, Inc.); Charles E. Merriam (Professor of Political Science, emeritus, University of Chicago); George N. Shuster (President, Hunter College); Archibald MacLeish (former Assistant Secretary of State).
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Separate caption, not photographer listed, just "editor and publisher."
